short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables web automation for EPIC Compliance Desktop version 3.0.0.3 or later, requiring Chrome version 127.0.6533.100 or higher.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension captures the details of web elements when users click on them, making it an essential tool for developers and testers. It allows users to easily identify and save HTML elements along with their XPath or CSS selectors, streamlining the process of web development and automation testing.
